errors.error_description: The installation instructions suggest installing with pip but fail to mention the required non-Python dependency `eccodes`, which must be installed separately before `iris-grib` can function.
correction_candidates: Install the `eccodes` library using your system's package manager (e.g., `sudo apt-get install libeccodes-dev` or `brew install eccodes`) before running pip install.
Run `pip install eccodes iris-grib` to install all dependencies automatically.
The recommended installation method is using conda: `conda install -c conda-forge iris-grib`.
Download the `eccodes` wheel file manually from the ECMWF website and install it with `pip`.
errors.golden_answer: Install the `eccodes` library using your system's package manager (e.g., `sudo apt-get install libeccodes-dev` or `brew install eccodes`) before running pip install.
